meaningMnemonic: Try to use your <radical>fingers</radical> to <radical>spoon</radical> out some of the <radical>sun</radical> and you'll come back with just one <kanji>finger</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: Don't worry, you aren't the only one out there with just one <kanji>finger</kanji>, <reading>shee</reading>p (し) only have one finger too. I mean, they're hooves, which are really just a single animal finger. It's just big and kind of flat.
